nodes.bodyText:
Is that the same as?
if(graphId == null && (pluginSelected && selectedPluginsValid)){

Given they are all &&'s, it should be. I added braces to statement where I felt that distinction was needed (usually if it also involved ||'s). Otherwise (in the case of only &&'s) I opted to not include braces because they wouldn't make a difference to the logic
Yep you are right. For some reason I thought the first was an ||. Just ignore me!
if you don't have a preference, can the || and && be added to the start of the line rather than the end?
